entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
